detail_desc: Non-padded bra in microfibre with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and appliqués on the knees.
Joggers in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with cuffed hems.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with short, lace butterfly sleeves, a pleat at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a decorative knot.
Short jacket in a textured weave with beaded embroidery, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and 3/4-length sleeves. Satin lining.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a bow at the front.

Metal necklaces. One shorter snake-chain necklace with a flat, round pendant and one longer necklace made from thin metal chain with a large, round, metal pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm and 69-76 cm.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Cropped top in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Sweetheart neckline with a wrapover bust and wide smocking at the back. Seam under the bust with a relaxed fit to the hem and long, wide sleeves with concealed elastication around the shoulders and narrow, gathered elastication at the cuffs. Cotton lining at the front.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and a sewn-in wrapover with a tie detail at the top.

Fleece-lined jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, a zipped chest pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, small embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders with a flounced trim and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft jersey. Top with short sleeves and a flounced hem. Bottoms with elastication at the waist and hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Shirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Suede hi-tops with a zip in the side and a decorative bow on the outside. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight legs.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and elastication at the hem.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined wrapover hood, high wrapover slits at the sides and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short skirt in an airy, smocked weave with a seam and wide, double-layered flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a mesh back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back with an elastic strap.
Metal keyring with a shimmering mini backpack in imitation leather. The backpack has a zip at the top, embroidery and appliqués.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a brushed finish. Long sleeves with lace sections, and sewn-on lace appliqués at the top and on the elbows.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports jacket with a slight sheen and a print motif at the top. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lightweight sweatshirt fabric inside.

Short, round-necked dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves. Frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders, a seam at the waist and a decorative scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and short puff sleeves with a scalloped trim. Scalloped trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Running vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Cargo joggers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Side and back pockets, flap leg pockets with press-studs, and legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with padded, triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners. Briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, short sleeves and a sewn-on bow at the front.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with raw, roll edges.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy wool jersey containing some cashmere with extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Heart-shaped plastic pot with an eyelet and satin ribbon at the top. Contains plastic hair clips and hair elastics. Size approx. 2.5x10.5x11.5 cm. Not for children under 3.
Vest top in cotton mesh with deep armholes.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Soft plastic smartphone case.
Block-coloured swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Ankle-length skirt in a soft, stretch, rib-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and press-studs at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in washed denim made from organic cotton with a small stand-up collar and decorative flounces. Concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, double-weave organic cotton with short, narrow shoulder straps and a button placket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and covered elastication at the hems.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Blouse in a cupro and viscose weave with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with appliqués around the edge. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with deep armholes, short slits in the sides and a small print on the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Short, off-the-shoulder, A-line dress in jersey with crisp flounces in tulle and concealed elastication at the top.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Short satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and hem, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Thin metal chain necklace with six pendants in various designs. Adjustable length.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Necklace of thin metal chains, one of which is decorated with a pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round, coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, approx. 43-50 cm and 50-58 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and ties at the top, a yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shirt woven in a viscose blend with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Shirt in a crinkled viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and detachable shoulder straps.

Long blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, draping at the bust and buttons at the top. Small frills at the shoulders and under the bust, wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.
Iron-on nylon patches to repair outer garments and functional garments.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and a rounded hem.
Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a metallic finish. Detachable, unlined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
